p: Interestingly, this treatment induced complete remissions in moderately severe to severe sHLH associated to EBV Virus especially when it was started less than 4Â weeks from infection diagnosis [16], [17], [18]. The combination has also been reported to be of value in severe influenza A/H1N1 and hepatitis-B-virus associated HLH [19], [20]. It is possible that the limited use of this protocol in sHLH associated to other viral infections may be due to their rarity or to their under-diagnosis.
